Posts.EditableText: Whenever I go to play a game an error reading "Error launching game: Could not load file or assembly 'CefSharp.Core.dll' or one of its dependencies. is not a valid Win32 application. (Exception from HRESULT: 0x800700C1)" I can't seem to get this to go away, even after several fresh installs. I couldn't find anything about this on the forums, is anyone else having this issue
Posts.HTML: Whenever I go to play a game an error reading "Error launching game: Could not load file or assembly 'CefSharp.Core.dll' or one of its dependencies. is not a valid Win32 application. (Exception from HRESULT: 0x800700C1)" I can't seem to get this to go away, even after several fresh installs. I couldn't find anything about this on the forums, is anyone else having this issue

Posts.EditableText: I think you need to uninstall and reinstall the .NET runtime libraries, rather than Quest itself.
Posts.HTML: I think you need to uninstall and reinstall the .NET runtime libraries, rather than Quest itself.
